leads.name: John Smith
leads.message: I'm interested in scheduling a test drive for the BMW M4. Please contact me at your earliest convenience.

leads.name: Sarah Johnson
leads.message: Looking for financing options for the Mercedes AMG GT. What are the current rates?

responses.message: Hi Sarah, thank you for your interest. I've sent you our current financing options via email. Please let me know if you have any questions.

leads.name: Michael Chen
leads.message: Interested in trading in my current vehicle for the Tesla Model S Plaid. Can you provide a trade-in estimate?

responses.message: Hello Michael, I'd be happy to help with a trade-in estimate. Please bring your vehicle by our showroom this week for an appraisal.

leads.name: Emily Rodriguez
leads.message: Referred by David Thompson. Ready to purchase the Porsche 911 Turbo S. Please prepare the paperwork.

responses.message: Excellent! I'll have all the paperwork ready for your visit tomorrow. Congratulations on your new Porsche!

leads.name: Robert Wilson
leads.message: Interested in the Audi RS6 but found a better deal elsewhere. Thank you for your time.

responses.message: Thank you for letting us know, Robert. Please keep us in mind for future vehicle needs. We'd be happy to work with you again.
